title: ADD_BLIP_FOR_COORD
content:
0xC6F43D0E// AddBlipForCoord
Blip ADD_BLIP_FOR_COORD(float x, float y, float z);Parameters:x: The X coordinate to create the blip on.y: The Y coordinate.z: The Z coordinate.Returns: A blip handle.Creates a blip for the specified coordinates. You can use SET_BLIP_ natives to change the blip.This is the server-side RPC native equivalent of the client native ADD_BLIP_FOR_COORD.
codeBlocks:
// AddBlipForCoord
Blip ADD_BLIP_FOR_COORD(float x, float y, float z);
